meanings.definition: The person in charge of a boat's crew and steering.
meanings.sent1: The cockswains guided the boat safely through the rough waters.
meanings.sent2: The experienced cockswains knew how to navigate the river efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The cockswains joked about having to steer through a sea of rubber ducks.
meanings.sent4: She steered the project like a skilled cockswain, leading the team to success.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cockswains shouting commands will forever be etched in my mind.

meanings.sent1: He cockswains the boat with confidence and precision.
meanings.sent2: They will need someone to cockswains the vessel during the race.
meanings.sent3: She decided to cockswains the group towards the finish line in the relay race.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, he always steps up to cockswains the team to safety.
meanings.sent5: Cockswains with determination, and you will reach your destination smoothly.

meanings.definition: The position of cockswain on a boat.
meanings.sent1: The captain assigned her the important role of cockswains for the upcoming voyage.
meanings.sent2: The competition required a skilled individual to fill the cockswains position.
meanings.sent3: The cockswains spot on the boat came with a great view of the open sea.
meanings.sent4: She cherished the responsibility that came with the cockswains position.
meanings.sent5: The cockswains position demanded focus and quick decision-making skills.
